summary: A multimodal diffusion pipeline that combines CLIP-based image and text encoders, a VAE for image latents, a UNet-style denoising model, and a scheduler to generate images, text, or synchronized image‑text pairs from various conditioning inputs.
business_intent: Provide a versatile AI service for generating visual and textual content—such as creating images from prompts, describing images with generated captions, or producing coordinated image‑text outputs—to support creative, marketing, and multimedia applications.
